toast.login_first: Please add your account in the settings first
toast.import_failed: Data imported completed, but {{platform}} platforms, {{game}} games and {{record}} records are failed

validate.username_2: Username must be at least 2 characters
validate.username_16: Username must be no more than 16 characters
validate.password_6: Password must be at least 6 characters
validate.password_24: Password must be no more than 24 characters

psn.npsso_desc: Login with PlayStation Network account to track user's game status. <0>Tutorial</0>

tutorial.title: Obtain NPSSO
tutorial.desc: Open the official website and log in to your account, then click the second button to get the NPSSO.

psn.monitor_desc: The Account ID of the user to be tracked.
psn.interval_desc: The automatic update interval when tracking the user's game status.

ns.import_desc: Import game records from the NX-Activity-Log plugin, supports automatic deduplication.
ns.drag_hint: Click or drag a JSON file here to import

account.username_desc: Only used for login, not displayed anywhere else.
account.password_desc: The system login password, please remember it well, as there is no reset function, and it is very difficult to restore.
account.expiry_desc: The default expiry is 30 days, if it exceeds this time, you need to log in again.

record.export_desc: Export all game records from the database, for backup or migration.
record.import_desc: Import game records from local files, supports automatic deduplication.
record.delete_desc: Dangerous operation: delete all game records from the database, consider it carefully.
record.delete_confirm: Game records cannot be recovered after deletion. To continue, please enter DELETE in the input box.
